summary: A plumber parked his van in front of an apartment house and entered the lobby. A neighbor suspected the plumber of being a detective due to his actions. The neighbor, Paul, felt uneasy about suspecting his neighbor and being dishonest. Several incidents had occurred recently, including a missing necklace and a stolen coin collection. Paul was trying to understand what was happening in the apartment house.
quotes: there was something going on that he didn't understand
many particular things had happened recently
